NEW FEATURES:
-Now compatible with barmoji!
-Swipe up, hold and finally release your finger to toggle between DockX and Barmoji. Just like how you enter app switcher.
-Added option to pick dock mode (enabling/disabling global & dictation)
-DockX will automatically conform with the selected dock mode
-Added reset to default for shortcuts
-Added option to display toast as text
-Go to setting to configure these new options.

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Increased max shortcuts to 8

-Fixed space bar scrolling triggers random haptic feedback

-Adjusted toast dimension for lowercase and Capitalize shortcuts
-Repositioned respring button
